title: Paradise Lost in Space and Cyberspace by Colin Swash - BBC Sci-f
description:
Two complete science fiction comedy radio series from the BBC. Hitchhiker&#039;s Guide to the Galaxy & Blackadder fans may recognise certain members of the cast.

PARADISE LOST IN SPACE by Colin Swash.

Norman is an idealist with a hand grenade. Max is a cheerful bore. Together they will soon ruin the lives of some friendly aliens. Starring Tony (Baldrick) Robinson & Geoffrey (Ford Prefect) McGivern.

Six half-hour episodes, first broadcast in 1995.


PARADISE LOST IN CYBERSPACE by Colin Swash.

It is 22nd-century Britain, and the collapse of the pensions system means compulsory euthanasia for 70-year-olds. Tough luck for George Smith - celebrating his sixty-ninth birthday - when the authorities get their sums wrong and come looking for him. Starring Stephen (Marvin) Moore & Geoffrey McGivern.

Six half-hour episodes, first broadcast in 1998.

Despite the similarity of the titles, Cyberspace is not a sequel.

My recordings from BBC7 at 160kbps CBR joint-stereo LAME mp3.

Freeview -> DVD Recorder -> MP3.

Have fun & please seed when you&#039;re done,

SeymourDAC

:)
